channel.title: How to fix item "dupe" in EasyRSC?
channel.description:
When I drop an item on the ground, go up or down a ladder/stairs and back, they'll appear 2 of that item on the ground (although only 1 can be picked up).
How can this bug be fixed? Thanks :)

item.title: How to fix item "dupe" in EasyRSC?

item.description:
@dedblu2005 wrote:

this would be a good question for kryptix

so luke, how is this fixed?
